fail.checkbox: The aria-checked attribute must be removed, or be consistent with the native checked state
fail.checkboxMixed: aria-checked="mixed" cannot be used on an native HTML checkbox
fail.rowSingular: This row attribute is supported with treegrid, but not ${data.ownerRole}: ${data.invalidAttrs}
fail.rowPlural: These row attributes are supported with treegrid, but not ${data.ownerRole}: ${data.invalidAttrs}
